SCTX:
Begin fightBovkinna

Short NoLore
short doonceA
short doonceB


if ( CellChanged == 0 )
    Return
endif
 
if ( doonceA == 0 )
	if ( GetDeadCount "Salvas Areleth" == 0 )
	    StartCombat "Salvas Areleth"
	    set doonceA to 1
	endif
endif


if ( doonceB == 0 )
	if ( GetDeadCount "Daral Thireloth" == 0 )
	    StartCombat "Daral Thireloth"
	    set doonceB to 1
	endif
endif


End fightBovkinna
